amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit oil and gas drilling within 125 miles of a State's coastline unless the State agrees to such drilling.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 109-540 to prohibit leasing (either oil and gas or natural gas) within 125 miles of a states coastline unless the state requests leasing.
